item.description:
Location has been changed to the end floor of Roots and Wings - NEST

Specific Topic: The Flash Technique

This is a new technique developed by David A. Frederick, PH.D.    This technique is used for chronic pain relief and many other issues.  It involves anchoring and modality switching.  It is quite interesting and quite powerful.

This will be an introduction and a breakdown of the technique.

Come Learn and Play!!

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin

978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com
